# NEHotspotManager.Error

**Enumeration**

An enumeration of errors thrown by hotspot manager methods.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Error
```

## Configuration errors

- **NEHotspotManager.Error.configurationNotLoaded**: The hotspot manager configuration is not loaded.
- **NEHotspotManager.Error.configurationInvalid**: The hotspot manager configuration is invalid.

## Other errors

- **NEHotspotManager.Error.internalError**: The hotspot manager encountered an internal error.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Error
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The hotspot manager configuration is not loaded.
items.name: NEHotspotManager.Error.configurationNotLoaded

items.description: The hotspot manager configuration is invalid.
